Já Bolsonaro apesar da pandemia,da nefasta atuação da oposição q é contra interesses do povo e do 🇧🇷, do ativismo do judiciário e da guerra 🇧🇴x🇷🇺, o governo dele é mt bom.

texto_en:
@lulaoficial you are the worst result to your management in education, health and public safety are ex of lack of study.
Despite the pandemic, the nefarious action of the opposition that is against the interests of the people and the (flag: Brazil), the activism of the judiciary and the war (flag: bolivia) x (flag: russia), his government is very good.
